justification: The article describes a VR scenario in which “participants and four bystanders had to evacuate a building that caught on fire… they encountered a trapped individual whom they could help,” and the researchers recorded whether participants offered help.

measured_by: fMRI emergency-video paradigm with varying number of bystanders
justification: A recent fMRI study “mapped neural activity as a function of the number of bystanders present… Participants watched an elderly woman collapsing on the ground” while brain activity was recorded, allowing the authors to quantify reduced preparatory responses as bystander apathy.
construct: bystander apathy / neural preparation to help
